Query:
ALTER TABLE ODOO_SALES
--ADD COLUMN PAYMENT_METHOD_ID INTEGER COMMENT 'Gotten from pos_payment.payment_method.id';

--ALTER TABLE SALES
--DROP COLUMN PAYMENT_METHOD_NAME;
ADD COLUMN PAYMENT_METHOD_NAME VARCHAR COMMENT 'Means used to make payment gotten from pos_payment_method.name';

CALL SP_INCREMENTLOAD_ODOO_SALES();

Execute task DEVELOPMENT.SALES.RUN_SP_INCREMENTLOAD_ODOO_SALES;
SELECT * FROM PRODUCTION.SALES.ODOO_SALES WHERE PAYMENT_METHOD_ID IS NULL;

create or replace view PRODUCTION.SALES.V_ODOO_SALES_MERGED(
	ID,
	PRODUCT_NAME,
	PRODUCT_CATEGORY,
	PRODUCT_CODE,
	PRICE,
	PRICE_LIST,
	QUANTITY_SOLD,
	COUNTRY,
	DUKA_NAME,
	SHOP_KEEPER,
    PAYMENT_METHOD,
	CLIENT_NAME,
	CLIENT_PHONENUMBER,
	CREATED_AT,
	CREATED_BY
) as 
SELECT OS.ID, OS.PRODUCT_NAME,
OS.PRODUCT_CATEGORY, OS.PRODUCT_CODE, OS.PRICE, OS.PRICE_LIST, 
OS.QUANTITY AS QUANTITY_SOLD, OS.COUNTRY, OS.DUKA_NAME, OS.SHOP_KEEPER, OS.PAYMENT_METHOD_NAME,
OC.NAME AS CLIENT_NAME, OC.PHONE_NUMBER AS CLIENT_PHONENUMBER,  OS.CREATED_AT, OS.CREATED_BY
FROM SALES.ODOO_SALES OS
JOIN CLIENT.ODOO_CUSTOMERS OC ON OC.USER_ID = OS.CUSTOMER_ID;


SELECT CREATED_BY FROM PRODUCTION.SALES.V_ODOO_SALES;
